summary.content: Over the weekend, I came across news about Mozilla’s new roadmap laying out the plans for the future. MozillaZine had something to say about it here.

content.html:
Over the weekend, I came across news about Mozilla’s new roadmap laying out the plans for the future.

MozillaZine had something to say about it here.
content.plain:
Over the weekend, I came across news about Mozilla’s new roadmap laying out the plans for the future.
MozillaZine had something to say about it here.
content.source:
Over the weekend, I came across news about [Mozilla’s new roadmap]({{% wayback "http://www.mozilla.org/roadmap.html" %}}) laying out the plans for the future.

[MozillaZine]({{% wayback "http://www.mozillazine.org/" %}}) had something to say about it [here]({{% wayback "http://www.mozillazine.org/articles/article3042.html" %}}).
